title: How did you become a screenwriter? - Quora

response.answer_text: It was my passion to become a film maker, at age of 15 i wrote stores at that i dont know how to write a story, i just write it on paper,after few years i studied about films , film making , story writing. after that i learned so much from movies, later i used internet for hoe to write story and screenplay, most of that help me and, after that i did a 3 months course for screen writing, and i wrote so many stories for short films, i just start my carrier right now, i dont think that chances comes very fast..just wait for patience looking for chance to prove myself. this the way i become screenwiter..
